item.title: 线程池
item.author: ricky
item.description: 我是零.线程池的主要作用 降低资源消耗：创建线程（分配栈内存）和销毁线程都是消耗资源的，通过线程池可以重复利用已创建的线程，降低线程创建和销毁

item.title: Enligsh_writing_chatgpt
item.author: ricky
item.description: Why I Learned English I recently watched some interesting videos on Bilibili about communicating with foreigners in English on websites. The videos were so funny that they sparked the idea of relearning the skill of the English language in me. Recently, I have started practicing my English from multiple aspects. Ultimately, my goal is to improve. Work is a crucial part of one’s life. Although the Chinese government has optimized COVID-19 epidemic control policies, the domestic software industry, as well as other industries, are still facing challenges overall.

item.title: English_writing_0424
item.author: ricky
item.description: Good morning/afternoon, it’s great to be here. Thank you for the opportunity to interview. I hope I can make a good performance today. My Chinese name is XXX and you can call me XXX which is my English name .I am 28 years old,born in Shanghai. I graduated from Shanghai Dianji Institute, my major is software engineering.
